content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Extraction Point at position (y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) and a furnace (position y2)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y2 to assembling machine at position (z)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (c)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position c1) and a furnace (position d1)
- Burner mining drill (position c2) and a furnace (position d2)
- Burner mining drill (position c3) and a furnace (position d3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires 2 iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without a required machine
- Ensure that you are using the appropriate crafting machine or furnace for the item you are trying to craft.
